meta.defaultTitle: Withinly - Your relationships mirror your inner world
meta.defaultDescription: We help you understand your emotional patterns and relationships with depth, nuance, and an AI companion who truly gets the human experience.
meta.keywords: psychology, relationships, self-awareness, emotional intelligence, AI therapy, personal growth

hero.headline: Your relationships mirror your inner world.
hero.subheadline: We help you understand both — with depth, nuance, and an AI companion who truly gets the human experience.
hero.tagline: Real growth takes courage. We're here to hold space for it.

hook.headline: We all carry patterns we can't quite name.
hook.description: Why certain people feel like home. Why conflict makes us run or fight. Why love sometimes feels scary. Why we push away what we need most.
hook.value: Withinly helps you understand these patterns — not through generic advice or quick fixes, but through deep reflection and an ongoing dialogue with an AI trained to see you, not categorize you.
hook.quote: This isn't about labels. It's about finally making sense of your story.

howItWorks.headline: A journey inward, at your own pace
howItWorks.subheadline: Self-discovery isn't a destination—it's an unfolding. Each step reveals something new, and every insight builds on the last.

step1.title: Start with gentle discovery
step1.description: Short, thoughtful assessments that reveal how you connect, love, and relate. No right answers — just honest reflection.

step2.title: Receive your first insights
step2.description: A personal report that reads like a letter from someone who truly sees you. Free users get the essence; members unlock the full depth.

step3.title: Begin the conversation
step3.description: Meet your AI consultant — trained in psychological wisdom but speaks like a trusted friend. They remember your journey and help you connect the dots.

step4.title: Go deeper when you're ready
step4.description: Unlock specialized reports on conflict patterns, relationship dynamics, family echoes, and more. Each one reveals another layer of understanding.

insight.title: Your journey is uniquely yours
insight.description: There's no timeline, no pressure, no "right way" to grow. Some days you'll want to dive deep, others you'll prefer gentle reflection. Withinly adapts to where you are.

different.headline: Real reflection, not quick fixes

doOffer.title: We do offer:
items: A companion who remembers your growth

different.tagline: Because real growth isn't about becoming someone else. It's about understanding who you already are.

trust.headline: Your inner world deserves protection
trust.description: This is sacred space. Your thoughts, patterns, and revelations stay between you and your AI consultant.

features.title: Complete privacy
features.description: We don't need your real name

features.title: Delete anytime
features.description: Take your insights and go, no questions

features.title: Ethical AI
features.description: Trained to support, not diagnose or fix

trust.tagline: We believe healing happens in safety. That's non-negotiable.

items.quote: I've been in therapy for years. This gave me insights my therapist and I are now exploring together.
items.author: Early member

items.quote: The report about my relationship patterns made me sob. Good tears. Recognition tears.
items.author: Beta tester

items.quote: It's like having a wise friend who remembers every conversation and helps me see the threads.
items.author: Premium member

pricing.headline: Fair exchange for real value
pricing.subheadline: Choose the plan that fits your journey of self-discovery

premium.title: Full Membership
features: Unlimited AI consultation with full memory
Specialized deep-dives (conflict, family patterns, intimacy blocks)

pricing.tagline: Cancel anytime. This is your journey, your pace.

earlyAccess.headline: Be among the first to explore
earlyAccess.description: We're opening doors to a select group who understand that real self-discovery takes courage. Join our early access list and we'll personally reach out when Withinly launches.

benefits.title: As an early member, you'll receive:
items: A personal welcome from our team

earlyAccess.urgency: We're limiting early access to ensure quality. Spots are filling.

signup.headline: Ready to understand your patterns?
signup.description: Join the waitlist and be first to know when we open.
signup.privacy: We'll send you a personal note when doors open. No spam, ever.
signup.successMessage: Welcome! We'll be in touch soon with your early access.
signup.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

closing.headline: Growth is hard. You don't have to do it alone.
closing.description: Whether you're curious or ready to dive deep, we're honored that you're here. This is the beginning of something meaningful.
closing.contact: Questions before joining? Reach a real human at hello@withinly.com
closing.languages: Launching soon in English and Lithuanian • More languages coming

footer.tagline: Where psychology meets poetry, and AI meets the human heart.
